Public NotInheritable Class XmlSchemaCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class XmlSchemaCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type XmlSchemaCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet for schema compilation and validation. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 包含 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 和 XML-Data Reduced (XDR) 結構描述的快取。

span.span: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) and XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schemas.

summary.span: 類別已經過時。

span.span: The class class is obsolete.

summary.span: 請改用 。

span.span: Use instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述已載入使用方法，這時結構描述會與命名空間統一資源識別元 (URI) 相關聯。Schemas are loaded using the method, at which time the schema is associated with a namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 對於 XML 結構描述，這通常是`targetNamespace`的結構描述的屬性。For XML Schemas, this will typically be the `targetNamespace` property of the schema. 這個類別會儲存 XML 結構描述和 XDR 結構描述，雖然任何方法和屬性，會使用或傳回僅適用於 XML 結構描述。Although this class stores both XML Schemas and XDR schemas, any method and property that takes or returns an applies to XML Schemas only. 此版本的產品支援位於 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 結構描述建議事項http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1和http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2。This version of the product supports the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1 and http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2. XML 結構描述必須參考 W3C 結構描述命名空間`http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema`其結構描述項目中。An XML Schema must reference the W3C Schema namespace `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` in its schema element. 請參閱範例的方法。See the method for an example. `XmlSchemaCollection` 可供進行有效率的資料驗證。`XmlSchemaCollection` can be used by for efficient data validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證 XML 文件使用`XmlSchemaCollection`。The following example validates an XML document using the `XmlSchemaCollection`. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/CPP/aa.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/CS/aa.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/VB/aa.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Add(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema schema) cil managed
Public Function Add (schema As XmlSchema) As XmlSchema

param.name: schema
param.span: 要加入至集合的 。

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將 加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds the to the collection.
The object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetNamespace`屬性用來識別此結構描述。The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema. 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`和`import`項目)，應用程式的信任層級會決定這些命名空間的解決方式。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值就一定會使用)。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`不需要使用者的認證用來解析任何外部資源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 這些命名空間的結構描述會載入僅供驗證。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 如此一來，它們不使用任何集合的方法或屬性存取。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果這些外部資源位於網路資源需要驗證，請使用多載採用為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定屬性。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection schema) cil managed

param.name: schema
param.span: 您要加入至這個集合的 。

span.span: The you want to add to this collection.

summary.span: 將指定的集合中定義的所有命名空間 (包含其相關的結構描述) 加入這個集合。

span.span: Adds all the namespaces defined in the given collection (including their associated schemas) to this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`並`import`項目或`x-schema`屬性)，應用程式的信任層級會決定這些命名空間的解決方式。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值就一定會使用)。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`不需要使用者的認證用來解析任何外部資源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 這些命名空間的結構描述會載入僅供驗證。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 如此一來，它們不使用任何集合的方法或屬性存取。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果這些外部資源位於網路資源需要驗證，請使用多載採用為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定屬性。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Add (string ns, string uri);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Add(string ns, string uri) cil managed
Public Function Add (ns As String, uri As String) As XmlSchema
public: System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchema ^ Add(System::String ^ ns, System::String ^ uri);

param.name: ns
param.span: 與結構描述關聯的命名空間 URI。

span.span: The namespace URI associated with the schema.

param.span: 對於 XML 結構描述而言，這通常會是 。

span.span: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the .

param.name: uri
param.span: 指定要載入之結構描述的 URL。

span.span: The URL that specifies the schema to load.

summary.span: 將指定的 URL 找到的結構描述加入結構描述集合中。

span.span: Adds the schema located by the given URL into the schema collection.

returns.span: 加入結構描述集合的 ，如果加入的結構描述是 XDR 結構描述，或者結構描述中有編譯錯誤，則為 。

span.span: The added to the schema collection; if the schema being added is an XDR schema or if there are compilation errors in the schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ns`已相關聯集合中的另一個結構描述，與所加入的結構描述會取代原始的結構描述集合中。If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection. 比方說，下列 C# 程式碼，從集合中移除 authors.xsd 和 names.xsd 會加入。For example, in the following C# code, authors.xsd is removed from the collection and names.xsd is added. ``` schemaColl.Add("urn:author", "authors.xsd"); schemaColl.Add("urn:author", "names.xsd"); ``` 如果`ns`已`null`且要加入的結構描述之 XML 結構描述`Add`方法會使用`targetNamespace`來識別集合中的結構描述的 XML 結構描述定義。If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection. 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`並`import`項目或`x-schema`屬性)，應用程式的信任層級會決定這些命名空間的解決方式。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值就一定會使用)。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`不需要使用者的認證用來解析任何外部資源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 這些命名空間的結構描述會載入僅供驗證。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 如此一來，它們不使用任何集合的方法或屬性存取。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果這些外部資源位於網路資源需要驗證，請使用多載採用為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定屬性。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證使用儲存在結構描述的三個 XML 檔案`XmlSchemaCollection`。The following example validates three XML files using schemas stored in the `XmlSchemaCollection`. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的 5 個輸入的檔案：The sample uses the following five input files: `booksSchema.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `booksSchemaFail.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#3)] `newbooks.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#4)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#5)] `schema1.xdr` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#6)]

exception.span: 結構描述不是有效的結構描述。

(在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值就一定會使用)。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 預設值`XmlUrlResolver`不需要使用者的認證用來解析任何外部資源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 這些命名空間的結構描述會載入僅供驗證。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 如此一來，它們不使用任何集合的方法或屬性存取。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果這些外部資源位於網路資源需要驗證，請使用多載採用為其中一個引數，並指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不會解析外部參考。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`使用正在存取屬性，`Add`方法會使用`XmlResolver`所指定屬性。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetNamespace`屬性用來識別此結構描述。The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema. 如果結構描述中包含`include`和`import`參考其他命名空間的結構描述，這些命名空間是僅供驗證載入的項目。If the schema contains `include` and `import` elements that reference other namespaces, the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 如此一來，它們不使用任何集合的方法或屬性存取。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下列範例會將結構描述加入至集合。The following example adds a schema to the collection. 傳遞至`Add`設定所需的認證，存取任何結構描述中所參考的外部資源所需的方法。An is passed to the `Add` method which sets the necessary credentials required to access any external resources referenced in the schema. returns.span: 加入結構描述集合的 ，如果加入的結構描述是 XDR 結構描述，或者結構描述中有編譯錯誤，則為 。

span.span: The added to the schema collection; if the schema being added is an XDR schema or if there are compilation errors in the schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ns`已相關聯集合中的另一個結構描述，與所加入的結構描述會取代原始的結構描述集合中。If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection. 如果`ns`已`null`且要加入的結構描述之 XML 結構描述`Add`方法會使用`targetNamespace`XML 結構描述，來識別集合中的結構描述中定義的屬性。If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` attribute defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection. 如果要加入的結構描述包含其他命名空間的參考 (透過`include`並`import`項目或`x-schema`屬性)，這些命名空間的結構描述已載入僅限驗證用途。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 不同於原始的結構描述，這些結構描述不會明確加入至結構描述集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 如此一來，它們不使用任何集合的方法或屬性存取。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

exception.span: 結構描述不是有效的結構描述。

span.span: The schema is not a valid schema.

summary.span: 取得值，表示具有指定命名空間的結構描述是否在集合中。

summary.span: 設定事件處理常式，接收關於 XDR 和 XML 結構描述驗證錯誤的資訊。

span.span: Sets an event handler for receiving information about the XDR and XML schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述新增至集合時，就會發生這些事件。These events occur when the schemas are added to the collection. 如果未提供事件處理常式，則就會擲回的任何驗證錯誤所在是`XmlSeverityType.Error`。If an event handler is not provided, an is thrown on any validation errors where the is `XmlSeverityType.Error`. 若要指定事件處理常式，定義回呼函式，並將它加入`ValidationEventHandler`。To specify an event handler, define a callback function and add it to the `ValidationEventHandler`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時，而且已被取代類別。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式來處理無效的 XML 結構描述。The following example shows how to set an event handler to handle invalid XML Schemas. [!code-cpp[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/CPP/schemaevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/CS/schemaevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/VB/schemaevent.vb#1)] 上述範例會使用檔案`invalid.xsd`做為輸入。The preceding example uses the file `invalid.xsd` as input. [!code-xml[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/XML/invalid.xsd#2)]
